settings.name: Day or night selection
settings.description: Select if you want to extract night roosts or day resting/feeding sites or (by default) resting sites during all 24h (back from midnight).

options.displayText: From sunset to sunrise (night). Timing can be adapted below.
From sunrise to sunset (day). Timing can be adapted below.

settings.name: Sunrise adaption time
settings.description: Select how many minutes after (negative numbers if before) sunrise your animals start resting.

settings.name: Sunset adaption time
settings.description: Select how many minutes after (negative numbers if before) sunset your animals start resting.

settings.name: Speed variable name
settings.description: Name of variable in your data set that indicates speed measured at each location to use for filtering for ground locations. By default interlocation speed ('speed') will be used.

settings.name: Maximum roosting speed
settings.description: Insert maximum speed that your resting animal is allowed (in m/s), also by location inaccuracy.

settings.name: Minimum roost duration
settings.description: Inset minimum duration (in h) that your animal has to be in a refined area to be considred resting. If rest radius is given, default here to 1 hour.

settings.name: Maximum roost radius
settings.description: Inset maximum radius (in m) of an area that you animal has to be refined to for being considered resting. If rest duration is given, default here to 1000 = 1km.
